A

addMark(int, int, char) - Method in class Board
Places a mark (X or O) on the game board at the specified row and column.
appointReferee(Referee) - Method in class Game
Appoints a referee to manage the game and runs the game.

B

Board - Class in Unnamed Package
The Board class represents the game board for tic-tac-toe.
Board() - Constructor for class Board
Constructs a new Board instance and initializes the game board.

C

clear() - Method in class Board
Clears the game board by resetting all cells to SPACE_CHAR and mark count to 0.
Constants - Interface in Unnamed Package
The Constants interface defines character constants.

D

display() - Method in class Board
Displays the current state of the game board including row and column headers.

G

Game - Class in Unnamed Package
The `Game` class represents the main entry point for a tic-tac-toe game.
Game() - Constructor for class Game
Constructs a new `Game` instance and initializes the game board.
getMark(int, int) - Method in class Board
Gets the mark (X, O, or SPACE_CHAR) at a specified row and column on the board.

Gets the name of the player.
getOpponent() - Method in class Player
Gets the opponent player.

I

isFull() - Method in class Board
Checks if the game board is full (no empty spaces left).

L

LETTER_O - Static variable in interface Constants
Represents the letter 'O'.
LETTER_X - Static variable in interface Constants
Represents the letter 'X'.

M

The main method for starting and running a tic-tac-toe game.
makeMove() - Method in class Player
Makes a move on the game board by taking user input for row and column.

O

oWins() - Method in class Board
Checks if the 'O' player wins the game.

P

play() - Method in class Player
The main play method for a player.
Player - Class in Unnamed Package
The Player class represents a player in a tic-tac-toe game.
Player(String, char) - Constructor for class Player
Constructs a new Player instance with a name and a mark.

R

Referee - Class in Unnamed Package
The Referee class manages and controls the game flow between two players on a game board.
Referee() - Constructor for class Referee
Constructs a new Referee instance.
runTheGame() - Method in class Referee
Runs the tic-tac-toe game.

S

setBoard(Board) - Method in class Player
Sets the game board for this player to interact with.
setBoard(Board) - Method in class Referee
Sets the game board for the referee to manage.
setoPlayer(Player) - Method in class Referee
Sets the player who will use the 'O' symbol.
setOpponent(Player) - Method in class Player
Sets the opponent player for this player.
setxPlayer(Player) - Method in class Referee
Sets the player who will use the 'X' symbol.
